title: Kolusum Illa Lyrics Inam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Kolusum Illa
Singer(s): Vishal C
Movie: Inam
Music: Vishal C
Lyrics: Charukesh

Kolusum Illa sangili illa
thodum illa kadhula.
Nikkura paaru sirikki mava
thathaa thaluva kannaala

Koodayila medhakkuren
nilava pol neliyuren
moodum paniya pola muthu muthaaga
Verkkum mugatha paarthu
mayakkam thannaala.

Venumnu kadathura elamaya
alukkuren.
thotta siningi pola motta moodaadha
vandu kerangi nikka
vittu odaadha

Elama eravu irandum irukkave
arugae varave alli serthukka
Odambu udhadu edhukku idaiveli
usure usure muththam pottukka

Kolusum Illa sangili illa
thodum illa kadhula.
Nikkura paaru sirikki mava
thathaa thaluva kannaala

Kannakuliyila muthamidayila
mella mella rusi pidikkudhe
idhaloram muthamani pallu kadikka.

Kadhu madalila moochu padayila
michamulla vetkam alaiyudhe
Mazhai kandadhu malare

Elama eravu irandum odhavave
kanavu nenavu rendum pinnikka
odambu udhadu enga pochu idaiveli
usurum usurum onnu sendhukka

Kolusum Illa sangili illa
thodum illa kadhula.
Nikkura paaru sirikki mava
thathaa thaluva kannaala

Melum povadharkku manam thudikkudhu
neram kalam thadai vidhikkudhe
idayil vida pennin manam marukka

Meendum sarappogum naalu
eppozhudhu kelvi mattum ingu minjudhe
viraivil annaal varumo

Elama eravu irandum irukkave
arugae varave alli serthukka
Odambu udhadu edhukku idaiveli
usure usure muththam pottukka
